p: Anti-GAPDH (sc-32233), anti-GFP (sc-9996), and anti-UL42 (sc-53333) antibodies were purchased from Santa Cruz Biotechnology (Santa Cruz, CA, United States). Anti-Î²-actin (ab8226) antibody was from Abcam.Monoclonal antibodies against US11 and ICP8 were provided by Professor Bernard Roizman. Goat anti-mouse immunoglobulin G (IgG) antibody, HRP conjugate was purchased from Merk, Millipore.
